signature: LYAH_NODISCARD LYAH_CONSTEXPR T LYAH_CALL lyah::epsilon()
description: Returns the machine epsilon for `T`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD LYAH_CONSTEXPR T LYAH_CALL lyah::infinity()
description: Returns the positive infinity for `T`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD LYAH_CONSTEXPR T LYAH_CALL lyah::nan()
description: Returns the quiet *not-a-number* value for `T`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD LYAH_CONSTEXPR T LYAH_CALL lyah::pi()
description: Returns an approximation of the pi constant for `T`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::vec()
description: Creates a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector. Values are set to 0.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::vec(std::float_t x, std::float_t y)
description: Creates a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector. Values are copied from the `x` and `y` arguments.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD LYAH_CONSTEXPR explicit lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::vec(__m128 m)
description: Creates a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector. Values are copied from the `m` argument.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD explicit lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::vec(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Creates a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector from the values of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD explicit lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::vec(lyah::vec<2, std::double_t> a)
description: Creates a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector converted from the 64-bit floating-point vector `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD explicit lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::vec(lyah::vec<2, std::int64_t> a)
description: Creates a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector converted from the 64-bit integer vector `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD std::float_t LYAH_CALL lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>::operator [](std::size_t index) const LYAH_NOEXCEPT
description:
Returns the component at `index` by value.
`index` must be less than 2.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD bool LYAH_CALL lyah::operator ==(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns `true` if all values of `a` are equal to the values of `b`, and `false` otherwise.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD bool LYAH_CALL lyah::operator !=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns `true` if some values of `a` aren't equal to the values of `b`, and `false` otherwise.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD LYAH_CONSTEXPR lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator +(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns a copy of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator +(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns the sum of `a` and `b`.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator +=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Adds `b` to `a`, then returns `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator -(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns a negated copy of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator -(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns the difference between `a` and `b`.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator -=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Subtracts `b` from `a`, then returns `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, std::float_t b)
description: Multiplies every component of `a` by `b`, then returns the result.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *(std::float_t a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Multiplies every component of `b` by `a`, then returns the result.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, std::float_t b)
description: Sets `a` to the product of every component of `a` by `b`, then returns `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Multiplies `a` by `b`, then returns the result.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Sets `a` to the product of `a` and `b`, then returns `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::mat<2, 2, std::float_t> b)
description:
Returns the result of the product of `a` and `b`.
`b` is stored in row-major order.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator *=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, lyah::mat<2, 2, std::float_t> b)
description:
Sets `a` to the product of `a` and `b`, then returns `a`.
`b` is stored in row-major order.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator /(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, std::float_t b)
description: Divides every component of `a` by `b`, then returns the result.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator /(std::float_t a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Divides `a` by every component of `b`, then returns the result.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator /=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, std::float_t b)
description: Sets `a` to the division of every component of `a` by `b`, then returns `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::operator /(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Divides `a` by `b`, then returns the result.

signature: lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& LYAH_CALL lyah::operator /=(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t>& a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Sets `a` to the division of `a` by `b`, then returns `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::max(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description:
Returns a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector storing the result of an horizontal max comparison between `a` and `b`.
Register elements that are not part of the vectors are not masked.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::min(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description:
Returns a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector storing the result of an horizontal min comparison between `a` and `b`.
Register elements that are not part of the vectors are not masked.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD std::float_t LYAH_CALL lyah::sum(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the sum of every component in `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::pow(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns the a 2-component 32-bit floating-point vector storing the result of the power of `a` to `b`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::rcp(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the reciprocal of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::sqrt(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the square root of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::rsqrt(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the reciprocal square root of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::sin(lyah::vec<2, std::float_t> a)

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::max(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns a 4-component 32-bit floating-point vector storing the result of an horizontal max comparison between `a` and `b`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::min(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns a 4-component 32-bit floating-point vector storing the result of an horizontal min comparison between `a` and `b`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD std::float_t LYAH_CALL lyah::sum(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the sum of every component in `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::pow(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a, lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> b)
description: Returns the a 4-component 32-bit floating-point vector storing the result of the power of `a` to `b`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::rcp(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the reciprocal of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::sqrt(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the square root of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::rsqrt(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Returns the reciprocal square root of `a`.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::sin(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Computes the sine of every component of `a`, then returns the result.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::cos(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Computes the cosine of every component of `a`, then returns the result.

signature: LYAH_NODISCARD lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> LYAH_CALL lyah::tan(lyah::vec<4, std::float_t> a)
description: Computes the tangent of every component of `a`, then returns the result.
